::Spears::

"Yes well...uh...it's not the crashing I'm worried about."
She kept going hoping she could do this again and still keep some of 
her pride, well, what litle was left anyway.

Trying to get her mind off of flying, she decided to change the 
subject.
"Have you and Ramulus been friends long?"



-- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker/Ramulus::
> 
> Striker raises an eyebrow, looking over at Spears. "The only 
alternative to 
> flying would be passing through three continents," he says, not 
realizing 
> that she was terrified of flying. He keeps walking, the two getting 
closer to 
> the pod.
> 
> "Don't worry," he says, "It seldom crashes."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus reaches Spears' pod, walking over to it. He frowns. With 
three bots, 
> the pod would be easier to carry than with one. If they got Brix 
and Octociz 
> split up first, they'd have three bots, including himself, to carry 
the pods.
> 
> "Briz/Octociz," he says into his comm-link as he gallops off toward 
the pod 
> Octociz had detected, "I'm heading for the pod you found. After 
that, we'll 
> need to carry another pod back to the Ark."
